title: internal/format: delete
body:
internal/format was introduced in https://golang.org/cl/6760. 

It should probably be deleted. Before that CL, people could easily copy cmd/gofmt and make their own variants (for example, gofmt as an RPC service). Now they cannot, because their copies will not be allowed to import "internal/format". If cmd/gofmt cannot be written using public APIs alone, that's probably a sign that the public APIs are incomplete or inadequate.

CC @griesemer
